shootingmodes: Single frame, continuous (Hi, Lo), self-timer (12sec, 2sec), remote control (0 sec, 3 sec) and auto bracketing (3 frames)
flash: Built-in retractable P-TTL auto pop-up flash
connections: USB2.0 (high-speed compatible)/AV output terminal, USB MSC/PTP. Video Output Format
label18: SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card (Eye-Fi card) compatible
label19: Built-in monaural microphone, recording sound level
